</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A non-existent [[Team Member]]. To compare non-existent team members use [[isNull]] or [[isEqualTo]]:
* <tt>[[teamMemberNull]] <template><title>=</title></template><template><title>=</title></template> [[teamMemberNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>false</value></part></template></tt>
* <tt>[[isNull]] [[teamMemberNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template></tt>
* <tt>[[teamMemberNull]] [[isEqualTo]] [[teamMemberNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template></tt> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[teamMemberNull]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Team Member]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>![[isNull]] [[teamMemberNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>false</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[str]] [[teamMemberNull]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>&lt;NULL - team member&gt;</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (_teamMember [[isEqualTo]] [[teamMemberNull]]) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] "team member is null";
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
